Detailed Description

A class implemnting the Tracker Raw Clusters.

Date:
2008/01/17 PZ First version

2008/01/20 SH Some comments and utils are added

2008/02/13 SH ADC,sigma,status arrays are changed as vector

2008/02/16 AO Renaming and new methods

2008/06/19 AO Using TrCalDB instead of data members

Date
2008/11/05 17:39:05

Revision
1.26
